about.title: About Durga Mandir
about.subtitle: A sacred place of devotion, peace, and spiritual enlightenment
about.historyDesc: Durga Mandir is a sacred place of worship dedicated to Goddess Durga, the divine mother and protector. Our temple has been serving devotees for many years, providing a peaceful environment for prayer, meditation, and spiritual growth.
about.missionDesc: Our mission is to preserve and promote the rich spiritual traditions of Sanatana Dharma while serving the community with devotion and compassion. We strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can experience the divine presence of Maa Durga.
